data.partBlankContent: Penny is starting school in September. Her sch___ has clo____ that a__ students we__. Penny i_ buying fi__ white shi___, th___ blue ski___, a__ two bl__ pairs o_ pants. She also needs one black coat for winter days, and one pair of black shoes.
data.answer: 佩妮九月份就要开学了。她的学校有所有学生都穿的衣服。佩妮买了五件白衬衫，三条蓝裙子，两条蓝裤子。她还需要一件冬天穿的黑大衣和一双黑鞋。
